alert.note: Alert for Coastal Harris; Grimes; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; San Jacinto; Walker; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 4:22AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Grimes, Montgomery, southwestern San Jacinto, northwestern Liberty, eastern Waller, south central Walker and northern Harris Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 422 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Montgomery to Lake Conroe Dam to near Splendora. Movement was south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Conroe, Humble, Tomball, Willis, Pinehurst, Aldine, Kingwood, The Woodlands, Greater Greenspoint, Spring, northern Northside / Northline, Oak Ridge North, Panorama Village, Shenandoah, Splendora, Patton Village, Roman Forest, Magnolia, Woodbranch and Cut And Shoot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Harris; Grimes; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; San Jacinto; Walker; Waller
